snippet: Sally Jewell, the chief executive of R.E.I., would take over a department that has been buffeted by controversy over the regulation of oil and gas drilling on public lands and in the waters of the Gulf of Mexico and the Arctic Ocean.
abstract: Sally Jewell, the chief executive of R.E.I., would take over a department that has been buffeted by controversy over the regulation of oil and gas drilling on public lands and in the waters of the Gulf of Mexico and the Arctic Ocean.
